Introduction
This topic describes the processes for handling forfeiture of benefits for subversive activities including
definition of subversive activities
VA notification of subversive activities
, and
handling forfeiture of benefits based on subversive activity under 38 CFR 3.903
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B  - Forfeiture of Benefits
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 3, Section B
